attributes.action: Propose that every shop must close at 12pm on a sunday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that sunday should be a day of rest for the whole of the uk. I do however understand the lack of time which the average British citizen seems to have, so a 12pm closing time shouldn't be to out of the question. With the internet at such an adavanced stage i feel that the shopaholics among us could still get their fix if needs be.
